Class KeyManager

java.lang.Object
java.awt.event.KeyAdapter
KeyManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.event.KeyListener, java.util.EventListener
public class KeyManager
extends java.awt.event.KeyAdapter
This class is used to listen key inputs.

  • Field Summary

    boolean down
    This variable represents the down key.

    This variable represents the enter key.

    This array contains the keys of the keyboard.

    This variable represents the D key.

    This variable represents the up key.

  • Field Details

    • keys

      private boolean[] keys
      This array contains the keys of the keyboard. The pressed key becomes true. The released key becomes false.

    • space

      public boolean space
      This variable represents the space key. Its value becomes true, when space key is pressed. Its value becomes false, when space key is released.

    • right

      public boolean right
      This variable represents the D key. Its value becomes true, when D key is pressed. Its value becomes false, when D key is released.

    • up

      public boolean up
      This variable represents the up key. Its value becomes true, when up key is pressed. Its value becomes false, when up key is released.

    • down

      public boolean down
      This variable represents the down key. Its value becomes true, when down key is pressed. Its value becomes false, when down key is released.

    • enter

      public boolean enter
      This variable represents the enter key. Its value becomes true, when enter key is pressed. Its value becomes false, when enter key is released.
